title: LOL Surprise Style Studio

thumbnailDetails.alt: LOL Surprise Style Studio Online Game

controls: Use the touchscreen to photoshoot and purchase outfits.
content.developer: M.G.A. developed L.O.L. Surprise! O.M.G. Style Studio.

fullContent: Homeâ€º FashionLOL Surprise Style StudioBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenReady to embark on fashion missions with Royal Bee, Neon Licious, Lady Diva, and Swag? L.O.L. Surprise! O.M.G. Style Studio is a 2D dress-up game in which you must prepare fantastic dolls for glamorous photo shoots.You must dress the girls according to the fashion tasks of Style Studio. Dress them up and complete the photo shoot in this fashion game to earn money. Try to get the most likes on social media!ðŸ‘ About This GameWelcome to the Style Studio! There are many fashion tasks that will challenge even a stylist like you.Your main objective in this fashion game, which will remind you of Stardoll, is to dress up the dolls, starting with Royal Bee for a photo shoot.However, you must prepare them according to the unique fashion theme of the task you are dealing with.Otherwise, you may not get the necessary likes on social media. It would be a disaster for the girls!View which clothes and accessories you should dress your doll in the Style Missions menu.As you fulfill the tasks, you will be able to prepare 18 more L.O.L. dolls, in addition to Royal Bee, Neon Licious, Lady Diva, and Swag.Strike Your Favorite Pose!You must wear the doll as the task requires. You need to get the matching outfits from the store section using your in-game money. After purchasing, you will be in front of the cameras!Select a stunning background for your shooting. Then, strike your favorite pose for the cameras. Press the shutter button, and voila! Share your beautiful pics on social media channels to get likes and attract new followers!Create Your Fashion StyleBesides styling 22 beautiful dolls, you can dress up your doll according to your own fashion style. The store sells many dresses, trousers, tops, and skirts. You can also access a wide range of accessories, such as sunglasses, from well-known brands.Of course, you need money to buy new outfits. Thatâ€™s why we recommend you perform photoshoots on the catwalk! Become a social media influencer to expand your wardrobe.Â ControlsDesktops and LaptopsMouse: To InteractMobile DevicesUse the touchscreen to photoshoot and purchase outfits.DeveloperM.G.A. developed L.O.L. Surprise! O.M.G. Style Studio.Whatâ€™s More?You may also play Barbiemania if you enjoy styling. Your objective in the game is to prepare Ellie for three different occasions: Every Day, Work and Party. Help her select the dresses, accessories and makeup for each event!For further options, look for other online fashion games on OnlineGames.io. Our community constantly tries to expand its game range. Please contact us if you have any suggestions or a wishlist!This article was updated on April 12, 20241 Player2DDress UpFashionFreeGirlKidsMakeupMobileMouseUnity
